Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.record

Class Record

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.util.EternaRunnable
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.record.Record
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Record extends EternaRunnable
Records any action of a Player and allows to replay them using a HumanNPC.
Actions:
  • Movement
  • Equipment
  • Poses:
    • Sneaking
    • Sleeping
    • Swimming

    • fetchRecordAction

      public static void fetchRecordAction(@Nonnull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @Nonnull RecordAction action)
      Fetches the current running Record for the players and adds a RecordAction at the current frame.
      Does nothing if:
      • Player has not running Record.
      • The Record is finished.
      Parameters:
      player - - Player.
